content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i saw 10 orange orbs to the west from our balcony on montano and golfcourse at about a 30 degree angle. we got in our car and attempted to follow west, overtook them between golf course and unser on montano. saw two or three to the south and two to the north.

i was driving, my wife was passenger. as we drove under the flight path, she looked north and saw one of the orbs eject another object: this one had two rows of lights (either three or four each) one row was red, the other green. 

she said this other object hovered for a few seconds and then dropped quickly.

i turned south on unser and saw two of the orbs to the east. turned east on a cross street, but all the orbs were gone.
content.summary: 10 orange orbs of indeterminate size slowly moved across horizon west abq.

content.detailedDescription: It's may 20, 2017 and at 10:34 pm, i was on my walkway and happen to look up to the beautiful clear night full of starts.  i happen to notice a moving star like object.  waited to see if it was a falling star but it was not.  it moved in a steady northerly direction from the south at a steady pace but not as slow as a plane.  much faster.  it did not change directions.
content.summary: Star shape light moving across in a star filled sky at night.

content.detailedDescription:
May 4, 2012
hilo town
hawaii
bayfront ocean side

evening 

this 'sighting' was discovered on film 'two-years' after i filmed this of hilo town at night ... i was standing along the shore at bayfront, (notice: around .32-.36 marker point in the film)  there are some circular 'lights' that begin to surface, make themselves 'visible' just coming 'over-top' of the tree tops, in the distance of hilo town.  they start to come over the trees at the time that the sound of the semi-truck passes ... when the volume on the film gets louder ... the circular lights 'show' over the tree tops ... first kind of all clustered together as one entity/object that then sort of separates or changes its light pattern ... it keeps traveling ... forward .... going in the same direction ... nearing / closer to the nearby ocean waters ...

this just 'happened' to 'catch' my eye; two years after i accidently filmed this.  quite exciting for me to discover this on film ... had i know i was filming or going to catch this sight on film; i would have continued to film ...

i was out enjoying the magnificent weather one evening near the ocean and the lights of the town.  

apparantely it was meant for me to see this, and to get it on film.  as, i've encountered other sightings, experiences, etc., but either i was not 'quick' enough to 'think' to film or photograph, or actually did not realize, 'in those moments' what is was ... i spend time (probably too much time) trying to figure out what i am seeing ...

however; there is some type of communication; over the years, i have discovered.  as my question(s) get answered ...

so interesting, so amazing.  

i hope i am able to upload this brief video


note:  what i see are four, possibly 5 (at the very beginning of visibility) ... four closely knitted together .... then, opening/separating in to the common pairs ... two  two

just to unique and cool for me ....

aloha
mahalo

you can hear me saying "hilo at night!"

please comment
then the semi-truck passing sounds
and, the "light" coming over-top of the distanct hilo town trees !

orbs
lights
objects
energy
communication
content.summary: Accidently discovered these ufo's two years later; after i filmed this while at bayfront, near the ocean, in hilo town, hawaii one evening.  all to my surprise!

content.detailedDescription: Approximately 8:45 pm was standing in my driveway looking up to see if i saw any lightning from distant storms. saw one glowing orange light fly overhead traveling from east to west. immediately noticed there was no sound whatsoever coming from it. was flying below the thick clouds. about a minute or so later saw 2 more lights trevaling same route side by side but staggered. another few seconds later 3 more lights in triangle shape flew overhead in same direction. i ran inside to get my wife and son to witness it. as i was waiting for them to come out i saw 2 more flying in staggered formation. they were all completely silent and moving at a quick but steady pace. were definitely moving nonstop. my heart was racing and it seemed really surreal. like i was watching a movie. it was kind of disturbing. they didn't appear to fly like anything one would logically believe capable.
content.summary: 6 glowing orange lights flew over house

content.detailedDescription:
While walking out in the side yard of the farm i noticed an object flashing lights very quickly.  the order of the flashing appeared to be random.  the lights were red, white and blue/green.  the object was moving at a high rate of speed in a southernly direction.  i went in to shut the chicken coop.  approximately 5 minutes later i looked for the object and could not find it.  as i walked back to the house i saw the object, now to the west, at approximately the same altitude.  it appeared as about the same intrinsic size as when i first spotted it.  

when  i say one object.  i am assuming that the object i saw in the west was the same object i saw a few minutes earlier in the east.

it appeared that the object was over the lees summit area.  but without any point of reference i can only say that it was in that general direction.  

when i say the object appeared to be moving at a high rate of speed, it coved an arc of the horizon of about 15 degrees in less than 10 seconds.

i was a weapons technician in the air force for 8 years.  a weapons crew chief for 5 years.  i worked on f-4's, f-15's, a-10's, f106's, t33 & t38 aircraft.  i also had the opportunity to observe a ife landing by an sr71 in the mid 1970's.  i do know aircraft.  while not familiar with all possible configurations of aircraft, i do recognize a plane or helicopter or blimp, over an unknown.
content.summary: Saw rapidly flashing lights in sky over the lees summit/independence area,

content.detailedDescription: My mother and i saw a green light flashing in the nw sky and assumed it was an aircraft, then we realised most aircraft do not flash green at consistent, one second intervals.  the object moved s, hovered and flashed as a red disc with white center. then the object moved nw again and repeated the flashing sequence. it moved w , hovered and repeated the flashing sequence. after the last, red/white flashing sequence, the object moved lower in the horizon until we lost sight of it. this last about five to seven minutes.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Small green light moving in the sky unlike common aircraft

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting out side with my friend smoking and i looked up and told him the star was jupiter and we both notice a light moving really fast it looked like a star but it moved to fast and was like red and it got bright than dim. it moved in zig zag form. it was a very strange light red like than it just vanished with a bright glow since my iphone sucks i could not take pictures or bideo because i couldnt pick it up with my camera.
content.summary: The light was flying near the jupiter star and it moved to fast side to side i never seen nothing like it

content.detailedDescription:
Olá
o meu avistamento passa-se em portugal nos arredores da cidade do porto numa vila que hoje também é cidade, chamada maia entre 1978 1979,  não sei precisar ao certo. eu teria na altura unss 10 anos mais ao menos.
nessa época eu vivia numa zona um pouco rural e meia deserta. minha casa ficava a 2 km da casa mais próxima e se situada entre um grande campo de cultivo na frente da casa e uma bouça nas traseiras. o sitio era muito fixe mas de noite metia um pouco de medo. tudo isto se passa depois do jantar, como não tínhamos casa de banho dentro de casa e a casa de banho ficava nas traseiras da casa e não tinha luz era uma vela que usavam os eu pedi a minha mãe para vir fazer xixi em frente à casa,  como tínhamos uma lâmpada logo a saída da porta eu podia estar sossegado. liguei a luz e disse a minha mãe que  estava na cozinha a lavar a loiça que ia fazer xixi... sai e quando estava de costas para a casa e virado para o campo ouvi um zumbido não muito fraquinho quando me volto fico perplexo com o que vejo a pairar por cima da minha casa, um objecto com cerca de três metros de diâmetro em forma de disco prateado e cheio de luzinhas brilhantes, ainda chamei a minha mãe para ela vir ver mas ela não ligou nenhuma. o objecto 2 ou 3 minutos mais como se me estivesse a observar e depois ganhou um velocidade incrível e desapareceu em dois segundos  nas estrelas .No dia seguinte como o meu pai trazia o jornal todos os dias depois do trabalho e como morava relativamente perto do aeroporto francisco sá carneiro, tentei ver se havia alguma notícia a falar de alguma coisa, mas não apareceu nada. na altura não tive medo mas passei a ver o mundo de outra forma e foi sempre acompanhado o que se vai passando pelo nosso planeta. durante o tempo que vivi nessa casa nunca mais voltei a ter outro avistamento, mas tive várias situações de me deitar na sala e acordar no quarto sem saber como e não sou sonâmbulo, mas também não sei se isso tem alguma relação. mas a melhor está para vir. hoje em dia tenho uma filha com 22 anos e o namorado dela aconteu-lhe uma coisa bastante estranha. a pouco tempo ele acordou de manhã com um golpe na cabeça perto da fonte, pegou e foi ao hospital ver o que era aquilo porque não se lembra de fazer esse golpe. conclusão os médicos no hospital disseram a ele que ele não podia estar vivo e não têem explicação. obrigado por poder partilhar a minha história. lf
content.summary: Objectivo em forma de disco prateado e cheio de luzes

content.detailedDescription:
My roommate and i, while trying to find 'white lick' hot spring, were stranded with a flat tire and no spare and hiked to a fire lookout we could see in the distance.   we spent the night on the beds in the old glassed-in tower.  (the fire tower employee was there as well.)

the sky was an explosion of stars, and, unable to sleep, i lay on my side, staring at the twinkling dark.  an object moved in my peripheral vision and i began to watch it start and stop and change direction in the sky.  it seemed to pulse with blue and orange light.

i watched it for a few minutes and then, from the next bed, my roommate asked, 'are you looking at what i'm looking at?'. we were both watching it!  then the fire employee, although frightened, watched it, too.  

it was visible for approximately 15-20 minutes, then it moved north ( i think - i am directionally challenged) flying above the idaho wilderness.

this has been my one and only sighting.  we were all stunned at seeing it.  the lookout girl was frightened but i felt lucky to have witnessed it.

an aside: a few of my friends who manned fire towers throughout the years in the idaho wilderness had told stories of ir witnessed strange flying craft in the backcountry, sometimes hovering above waterways.
content.summary: Observed object flying-stopping-changing direction from the tower of a blm fire lookout.  object had pulsing blue/orange lights.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on the southwest edge of the baseball field behind westerly creek elementary in denver's stapleton neighborhood.  i looked up from the game (north) because i saw a white teardrop shaped object climbing above the school's roofline as it flew from east to west.  the object flew past the western edge of the school and continued to climb to maybe 1500 feet.  at first i thought that it must be a drone because there were no visible propellors or strobe.  i quickly realized that there was no easy way to ascertain size or distance, it was half the size of the plastic ball shaped head of one of those color push pins at arms length. the object rapidly circled a little bit closer toward me (south) as it climbed to perhaps 2000 feet and hovered.  in full disclosure, i am an avid ufo nut, however i can only recall one other time in my life that i've seen an object that i couldn't explain.  this is also a highly populated area and directly in line with the dia flight path.  i thought that perhaps it could be a helicopter at a greater distance than i realized, but when you look on a google map i don't see any hospitals in close enough proximity to the flight path to explain the apparent size of the object. it is possible that someone could have flown a drone from central park in stapleton, but as you're about to hear that becomes doubtful.  the sighting was brief, no more than 90 seconds and probably more like a minute.  i knew that the object would be too small to resolve adequately on my cell phone, there was simply no point in recording something that might show up as a pixel in size when zoomed at best.  i believe that the object may have rapidly  swung from west to east at a distance of no more than a half a fist in width at arm's length.  the object quickly arced to the west and climbing in altitude headed north.  as the object approached the cloud ceiling (it seemed to be 3k-5k ft) i definitely saw it glint off the sun and it was just a bright white teardrop kind of shape.  i had fought the urge to ask others around me if they saw what i was seeing and i swore that if it came back i would point it out. it did not return, it appeared to continue to fly due north of me at a high rate of speed quickly diminishing into a speck before it disappeared. in retrospect, it is possible that the object was faintly glowing or perhaps it had a faint dark halo around it.  the luminance, speed and lack of visible aircraft attributes really caught my eye and i remember mentally searching for a rational explanation of what i was seeing.  not ten minutes later i saw a guy walking around the softball game with an slr and a massive telephoto lens attachment.  if i'd seen him during the sighting we would have either had a confirmed helicopter or intriguing images from a daylight sighting with traceable provenance.
content.summary: White teardrop shaped object of indeterminate size or distance flying at high speed with no strobes or apparent rotors

content.detailedDescription: On may 17th 2017 , around 7pm i walked outside on my deck and noticed the southeastern sky was making a twister type cloud ... i went and grabbed my camera took a few pictures and went out to the front of the house instead to see if it looked crazy that way too.. so i took a few pictures there even though nothing was out of the ordinary.. i went back to the other side of the house and looked up, and yelled to my faience..Look!! look at the sky !! he also saw this amazing sight... .In only 2 minutes or so, the twister had formed and a blue glowing ball was coming closer and closer... appearing to appear and disappear, being closer every time.. the blue glowing ball, or orb , ended up being only about 500 feet away before it disappeared. we then watched and took more pictures because the clouds looked like they had something in them .. and after it all started to blow over , or break apart.. there were smoke like clouds that looked different than any other we have seen ... and then they were gone. we felt extremely exhilarated and excited about what we had seen... we then went through the pictures and saw these awesome glowing blue orbs..  in the pictures and not just by our eye.. we couldn't even believe it . we then decided to share the beauty.
content.summary: The middle of the sky formed a twister and strange objects and a glowing blue ball appeared, in and out of the clouds.

content.detailedDescription: Spherical tubeular
content.summary: Save us! hollow moon destructive path noncondosive to species!Time rning out.

content.detailedDescription:
4-13-17 @ 0130:
i was in our big hangar at work after turning off the main lights and closing the main doors at night after everyone had left. (everyone left about 1900.) after i finished closing the last one i was walking to exit on the north side door of the hangar when i noticed something move. i then stopped to look in the back at the hangar (west wall) as to what was moving and i noticed it was someone walking behind the aircraft in back of the hangar. so i stopped (east wall) to look at who was there and i saw 2 long skinny legs grayish green in color and could tell whatever it was is was facing my direction and i then saw it turn and  begin walking to the south wall and was a little nervous by this point and quickly was walking to my exit on the north side of the hangar. i knew there was an aircraft parked in front of me so a very quickly looked in front of me so i didn't walk into the nose of the plane and once i knew i was in a clear path to the door i quickly looked back to where i saw this being and it was gone. i then heard a loud bang in the back southwest corner of the hangar and knew without a doubt whatever i was looking at was moving extremely fast! so i picked up my pace towards the door and then directly behind me was a loud bang on the main hangar doors where i was just standing seconds ago! as i reached for the door handle whatever it was i knew and could feel it directly behind me!!Every hair on my body was standing straight up! although i was obviously startled by this event i did not feel any negative energy associated with it. i was just scared because i knew it ran around and came up right behind me. that scared me but i didn't feel threatened necessarily.  the next day i told one coworker what had happened and we walked in together and showed him where the event took place. the hangar is 150'x 200' this being made in around the entire hangar in the time is took me to walk quickly about only 50'-65'! we also walked back by the plane i saw it next to and decided it was around 9'-10' tall. i definitely saw the legs clearly up to probably just below the waist. the color was unmistakably grayish green and i could tell it was skin not clothing. the legs were long and skinny and they were the same size above and below the knee. i did not see torso/head or arms it was behind the plane. i did clearly see it walk and turn to the south and legs bending and stepping. i was more fixated on the legs and i could have seen the feet but i did not. it made no sound.
 weather was clear and no wind

21 days later on 5/4/17 @ 0010:
same hangar while cleaning aircraft my phone that was playing music stopped after hearing strange talking on the other side of the plane i was working on. i walked over and nobody was there and the phone had full signal. so i thought ok pushed play on the phone again music started up and walked to the side of the plane again. i was pretty much in the center of the hangar at this point when all of this sudden the entire hangar started ringing exactly like a crystal meditation bowl!! it was so loud and i could actually feel it in my body so not only did i hear this i felt it! the sound was traveling around the hangar in a counterclockwise direction above me towards the ceiling atop the side walls of the hangar. it rang beautifully for about 20 seconds or so and then when it stopped i realized my phone was turned off again. so i turned my music back on again after that no more events that night and phone worked fine. after further investigation on my part i found the exact tone was f. the heart chakra note. so amazing i wish i could experience that again!
weather: was clearing after storm had moved about 25-30 miles to the south. no wind

12 days later on 5/16/17 @ 2035:
took portable speaker into same hangar and played the recording of f tone from a crystal meditation bowl and immediately got a very strong feeling of a presence!! again every hair on my body was standing on end as i walked around playing the tone on a speaker. for some reason i got the idea to play monks chanting om at 432 hz so i did and instantly my goosebumps went away and i never felt anything again that night. super strange! so i left the hangar without incident.
weather partly cloudy and windy

2 days later on 5/18/17 @ 2035:
took coworker with me into same hangar and both of us heard the f tone faintly. we both walked around and tried to find a source but could not explain it. coming from top of the hangar. 
weather clear no wind

1 day later on 5/19/17 @ 2130:
coworker and i went in again and heard and felt nothing.
weather cloudy and windy

i sure wish i knew what was happening!!! can beings communicate using tones and vibrations? is this thing i saw trying to communicate with me? next time i see it i'm going towards it.
content.summary: Saw 9ft tall greenish gray legs walking behind aircraft. circled the entire inside (150'x200') hangar in seconds.

content.detailedDescription: I went to work in the morning on a friday or saturday to do inventory and when i came out the door i was surrounded by all white.   i noticed to my left a person with a very large head who proceeded to his left and then walked very quickly towards my direction.   he then stood face to face with me being about my height.  i couldn't see anything but his head which looked like a very large upside down pear.    his skin was normal flesh color and eyes were normal.   funny thing he had a dark mostache covering his mouth.   don't remember any hair.   he said "hi dan" to me but with no mouth movement that i could see.  i head it in my head though.   i have no recall after.   susan birttnen asked me to file this encounter.
content.summary: Came out of work building at noon and encountered large head being with loss of memory after

content.detailedDescription: Having a summer bbq in the back yard. suddenly a cloud was over us and we looked up. knew it was an other worldly craft. a saucer with a lower extension with windows around it in witch i could see movement of outlines of some creatures. i felt in awe and didn't move. i just looked at it. i lost sight of it when it moved slowly away to the east.
content.summary: Having bbq and ufo appeared out of nowhere

content.detailedDescription: I was outside in my yard playing with other kids in the neighborood. it was still light out but after supper hours. my sister and i were standing in our yard, together when i noticed the ufo appear slowly from the left side of my neighbors house. i was totally fixated it was unreal! the craft moved very slowly, from the left to the right(toward my neighbor's rear yard). it made no sound. it had multiple lights around the outer edge of the bottom of the craft. the lights were different colors (primary colors) red, green, yellow. they were alternating in their blinking pattern. the bottom of the craft was circular. i was fixated on the lights. i said out loud, to my sister,who was standing beside me, "what is that?" . as the ufo continued to move from left to right, i saw the entire craft between the house and the barn that is also situated on mt neighbors property at the rear end . this gives a very good indication if the size of the craft. i only saw the (whole) craft briefly as it continued to move slowly in front of the barn, out of my sight. i expected to see it reappear once it passed the barn so i kept looking to my right, toward my backyard. the craft did not appear. i was so stunned. after a few moments, i cautiously began walking across my yard, and into my neighbors yard looking for the craft. it was no where. i looked up into the sky. nothing.The craft just disappeared i guess. just gone!! nothing !!  we called the police to report the incident. i still think about it to this day. my sister and i know that what we saw was a craft not of this world. our sighting was over 40 years ago. although i have moved, i recently visited my neighbor who still lives in the house next to the one i grew up in. i visited her with my eldest son whom i have recounted my story to many many times. as we were leaving my old neighbors house, i told the story again. i would love the opportunity to show and tell what my sister and i saw to an investigator. it was and still is a most amazing event.
content.summary: Ufo appeared slowly from behind my neighbors house. it moved very slowly in straight line toward rear of yard where i lost sight of it bc it moved behind their huge barn. my sister was with me. we both watched in awe

content.detailedDescription: I was going to my friend house to play with outside before lunch. i was on the driveway and i look up at the sky and saw a weird looking object. the object was a cylinder, white, 30 feet wide, and 12-14 feet tall. the object had no tail section, no wings, or propeller. the object had no sound and was flying east through the cloud because it was partly cloudy. i felt kinda worried a little bit than i wasn't then. i lost sight of the object when it flew away. the object was flying 575-600 mph.
content.summary: The ufo that i saw was white cylinder object

content.detailedDescription: So i was outside my house smoking a cig at about 2:00am. it was a clear cold night. as i take a drag, i look up at the sky looking for shooting stars to pass the time. my eye catches what i believed to be a plane coming off of the horizon. as it draws closer i notice there are no red or green lights where the wings should be. the only light on it was a bright white light, from my point of view, pointing in a slightly downward position. as it clears the tree line i notice now quickly it is actually moving. it was dark so i didn't have any idea just how fast it was going. it clears the trees, and is directly above me in about 1.5 seconds. just as it passes my couldesack it flashes very brightly, iighting up the houses around me and disappears with no sound. i put my half smoked cig out and went inside immediately.
content.summary: Moved from 10deg to 30deg over 1min. moved from 35deg to 90deg within 1sec. disappeared in a flash.

content.detailedDescription: I had just arrived back home after spending the evening with some friends. i looked out of my balcony and noticed an extremely bright light in the sky, quite low. initially i had assumed it to be a star which was burning unusually bright. however, on closer inspection, i was convinced that the object wasn't outside the earth's atmosphere. it was very low, appearing below the clouds and also hovering at an altitude much lower than aeroplanes. also, i made a conscious effort to look for other stars and the moon, but this object was the only bright thing in the sky. i could not see any other stars and i could not see the moon. the object was so bright that if you looked at it for more than a few seconds, it would leave a blind spot in my vision. as i observed the object, i noticed tentacles or appendages that seemed to be made from frozen/static electricity. the object seemed to be a mushroom or triangle shape with a base. the object did not move, it hovered in a fixed position and i observed it for almost 2 hours, even as the sun began to rise. it was still visible in the sunlight but slightly harder to see. my initial reaction was curious, but when i became convinced it wasn't a star, i became fearful. i had honestly never seen anything like it. i attempted to message a couple friends so that i'd have some additional witnesses, but being 5am, everyone was asleep. eventually i went to bed (around 7am) and the object was still there, but seemed further away (it may have been the impact of the sunlight on my vision which made it look smaller). when i woke up a few hours later, the object had disappeared. i managed to take a few photos and a video, but being an iphone camera, i wasn't able to capture anything close to the amount of detail i observed with my own eyes. i also tried sketching the object but i'm not very good at drawing.
content.summary: I had just arrived back home and noticed an extremely bright object in the sky which seemed to have appendages or tentacles which looked like static electricity. initially i thought it was star but it wasn't certainly within the earths atmosphere

content.detailedDescription: The video i am attaching has strong language so just a heads up. i was hanging out with a family member up on a landing on the second floor of a building watching fireworks since it was new years eve. as my family member and i were getting ready to head inside because the fireworks display was over, when all of a sudden an object comes flying over the hills from towards pacifica straight at us. it stops right above us, hovers then starts flashing at us, changes colors (unfortunately the video didn't capture this) then does a horseshoe path towards the hills of daly city, towards the ocean.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orb came over the hills of pacifica/san bruno (sweeny ridge area trail) straight towards our location

content.detailedDescription: Me and my son chad was setting up a water slide for my grand daughter anna's birthday party.The top hose was leaking bad. chad climb up the slide to repair the leak.I remained on the ground.While chad was at the top of the slide i glanced up to my right and noticed a silver disc shaped object about half the size of thumb which i estimate was about a mile away in a clear sky.I yelled at chad to turn around and look at the object.Chad said what is that.I grab for my phone to take a picture and realized my phone was in the house. i turned around and yelled a harley a neighbor who lives across the street who was on her porch with her children waiting for us to complete setting up the water slide.I yelled harley look and pointed at the disc hovering in the sky. i yelled use your phone get some pictures.She walked towards me and yelled what.I yelled again get some pictures.She just stood there looking at the object.The object then moved straight up slowly and sped off at a high rate of speed from a dead stop the object enter a cloud which i estimate to be about a mile and a half to right of the object. when the object enter the cloud i noticed that the cloud parted as the disc enter as if the cloud had been hit with a large gust of wind.That was the last we saw of the object it never appear out of the other side of the cloud.We watch for 15 to 20 minutes.Harley with her camera phone in hand but the object never reappeared. we
content.summary: Setting up water slide for birthday party observed a disc shaped object hovering then move upward and speed off

content.detailedDescription:
Between the years of  2006-2007 in the fall ,shortly aftersunset,my son and i were traveling west on 1st street and just crossed bypass headed home. when we noticed  a search light flashing coming from sw in direction of base. as well as 5 lights in triangle formation. as we drove heading toward home it became larger and it was black and triangular. it was huge, maybe size of half the base as it appear to hoover over it, it remained there as we turned corner of our block,as well as after we got out of truck at home to then see it still there. 
 i then went in house to find base phone # and called to ask what it was and if they knew it was there,the man said no and that it was probly light from tower on air strip there. i described what i saw. then the  ship ascended or else it turned off the lights and it was no longer there. the sighting lasted approximatly 15 minutes to half an hour'. it was shocking how large it was and that the base said it didnt see it.
content.summary: it was shocking how large it was and that the base said it didnt see it.

content.detailedDescription: 05/19/17 10:56pm est stepped out to walk the dog and saw three very bright orange lights in triangle pattern moving north and dropping to the horizon, moving fairly slowly not making any noise, one dropped below horizon the other 2 kept moving and they too eventually dropped below the horizon.
content.summary: 3 orange lights in triangle shape moveing from ne to n finally going under the horizon

content.detailedDescription: Estaba manejando mi vehiculo y nos dirigiamos camino a  casa un dia de semana y estaba acompanado de mi hijo y esposa el cual mi hijo tambien lo pudo ver mi esposa no vio nada,manejaba en la avenida principal llamada  don julio centeno a la altura de la bigott una empresa de la zona,cuando me percate del sobre vuelo de la nave* en forma de cigarro blanca y sobrevolaba muy despacio en una zona montañosa que de hecho es un parque natural llamado san esteban y esta nave volaba por todo un camino que se esta construyendo una carretera el cual pasara pronto un tren o algo asi.Lo perdi de vista porque no pude seguir viendolo ya que el trafico del momento no me permitio,pero la casi media hora que loobservamos volaba muy bajo y bastante lento. si era primera vez que veo uno en esa forma de cigarro. debo confesarles que no es la primera vez que he visto este tipo de maravillosos acontesimiento, en epocas anteriore de dia he llegado a ver muy desde lejos platillos con movimientos lentos y despues se desaparecen en el cielo, el mas cercano que pude tener fue una esfera como del tamaño de una pelota de beisbol y era una luz blanca muy brillante parecia como de cristal, yo estaba con dolor de barriga y sali al monte cerca de mi casa para evacuar ya que el unico baño estaba ocupado y fue en esa oscura noche en el monte cuando lo vi.Describirles mis sentimientos es facil pues me aferra mas a la idea que no estamos solos y que gracias a personas como ustedes tenemos una ventana de oportunidad para que no tilden a uno de loco.Muchas gracias por su atencion.
content.summary: esta fue mi ultima ocacion porque la primera vez que vi uno similar era una pelota de beisbol de cristal en la noche

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: It was mid august 2013. got up around 4am(gmt) and made myself a cup of coffee and went to my rear (eastern) balcony, looked up, the sun was already rising over the mountains, and that's when i saw it, a translucent chrome sphere. it moved very slowly, didn't make a sound, what i actually noticed was the absence of ambient sound. no noises, no car sounds, no bird chirps, no wind noise, and it was a bit windy. it probably hovered at an altitude of 30/40 meters, and from 500 to 700 meters in front of me, moved in various directions for about 20 minutes, during that time, it gradually started to "build up" a misty cloud on the lower part of the sphere, then absorbed through the misty part two other smaller spheres that appeared similar in nature, at that point it changed to an oval shape that was tilted to the side, oscilated quite a bit and clearly rotated on itself. the rest of the time, it "built up" even more mist, to the point when it appeared thicker than a cloud, after that, heading in a ne direction, it disappeared leaving a small trail and a pale blue/greenish hue. at the time, i thought it was a beautiful event, very soothing. but i saw it again today, and i live 200 kilometres away from that other location, and where i live now is considered to be a very ufo activite area, since it's close to the sea.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I woke up at 4am, around 5 i was standing on my rear balcony smoking a cigarette, when suddenly i noticed a sphere in the sky, it was solid, unlike a bubble, simultaneously chrome and translucent. hovered for a while, then disappeared leaving thick mist.

content.detailedDescription: Sometime in 1951, i was a passenger on an american airlines flight from st. louis to tulsa.  about dusk while at cruising altitude, the pilot said for those of us on the right side of the plane look to the west at a very large vehicle flying with us.  it was cigar shaped and had some steady lights along its side.  it was not moving up or down, just was steady, going the same speed we were.  the pilot said over the pa system that the object was noted on tulsa radar but was not responding to calls on all hailing frequencies.  he asked that those of us who had seen the object to move into the aisle so the passengers in the left seats could see the object.  during that time i could not see it.  when i was able to return to my window seat, i observed the object no more than a minute before it peeled off to the west and disappeared in the distance.  i would guess that it had been in visual contact with our airplane 7-8 minutes.  there were about 30 passengers on the airplane.  something happened to the airplane that we had to land in springfield, missouri.  rather than go on to tulsa, i took the bus from springfield to fayetteville, arkansas where i was living at the time.I never saw or heard anything in the news about the encounter and i do not know if american airlines was advised officially about it.  it was my second ufo encounter and my last one.
content.summary: Was a passenger on american airlines from st. louis to tulsa.  pilot said to look to right at object following us.

content.detailedDescription: Test case
content.summary: Test case

content.detailedDescription: While driving east on old hwy 70 in arkansas on april 15, 1950, people in a car ahead of me motioned toward an object hovering over the highway ahead of us about a mile and about 39 degrees above the horizon.  we got out of our cars and watched it for about 5 minutes when it suddenly flew upward and away.  i drove on to my destination of baltimore.  the next day, a photo and article appeared on the front page of the baltimore sun and the image was exactly like what we had seen on the highway.  years later i contacted the sun to see if i could get a copy of that newspaper article and was told they would not have it in baltimore but it would be available at the maryland archives.  i contacted the archives who, after a few days, told me the photo had been cut out of the front page of the paper from its position that i had said it was in.  the object we saw did not move during our observation until it took off toward the east.
content.summary: While driving on hwy, people ahead of me pointed to object.  we got out of cars and observed.

content.detailedDescription: Please go to multimap,select u.K,enter "frankley resovoir",find "frankley lane",look in field beside road and see indentation in the grass,just to the right see orb/disc?,do this on birdseye view.It does not appear on other views,however the indentation does indicating it has moved.\i was looking at this area as it was where i used to live.
content.summary: Orb/disc?
